Description: 3-bed/1-bath second floor condo for rent in Cambridge. Short 15-minute walk to Davis Square, red line, grocery stores, shops, restaurants and cafes. Modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, gas stove, microwave, fridge and granite countertops. Open concept living/dining room with vaulted ceilings. Two medium sized bedrooms and one smaller bedroom. Small front porch and large back porch overlooking Matignon Athletic Field. Central AC. Laundry in-basement. One (1) tandem parking space included in rent. One cat OK, no dogs please. Available 9/1. First, security and brokers.
